name: apis/telegram/bot/utils/Update getter
description:
Extracts the update record from a Telegramn update received via a webhook request.

See https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#update.

0a848ee9-3d47-48a4-882c-9483cecdc7a6.description: Sends update record. Type documents simple messages only. For full field types see https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#update.
